attributes.title: The Worst Sports Fans  - #01
attributes.caption: Sportsball discusses the Worst Sports Fans in the world.
attributes.description: Join Jack Pattillo, Tyler Coe and Joel Heyman as they discuss Madden 16, Little League World Series and the Worst Sports Fans in the world on the very first episode of Sportsball!! This episode episode originally aired on August 25th 2015.

attributes.caption: Sportsball discusses head injuries.
attributes.description: Join Jack Pattillo, Tyler Coe and Joel Heyman as they discuss rugby NFL players, concussions, fantasy football, courtroom disasters and dangerous segways on this week's episode of Sportsball! This episode episode originally aired on August 25th 2015.

attributes.title: Who Farted On Bob Costas' Pillow? - #11
attributes.caption: Sportsball discusses the Royals winning the World Series, the mystery of Bob Costas' pink eye, the Sepp Blatter FIFA scandal, the Rugby World Cup Final and the College Football Playoffs.
